    <metadata>

      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">

          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="fr">Cycle de la roche et temps</string>
            <string language="en">Rock cycle and the weather</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Felsenschleife und das Wetter</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciclo da rocha e o tempo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ciclo della roccia ed il tempo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κύκλος βράχου και ο καιρός</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciclo de la roca y el tiempo</string>
          </title>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <description>
            <string language="fr">Cette illustration représente les quatre sortes  principales de temps qui contribuent à la décomposition des roches au cours du cycle de la roche.</string>
            <string language="en">This illustration represents the four major kinds of weather that contribute to the breakdown of rocks in the rock cycle.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">gel</string>
            <string language="en">frost</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">pluie</string>
            <string language="en">rain</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">cycle de la roche</string>
            <string language="en">rock cycle</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">soleil</string>
            <string language="en">sun</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">temps</string>
            <string language="en">weather</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">vent</string>
            <string language="en">wind</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung stellt die vier Hauptarten des 
Wetters dar, die zum Zusammenbruch der Felsen in der Felsenschleife 
beitragen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração representa os quatro tipos 
principais do tempo que contribuem à avaria das rochas no ciclo da 
rocha.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione rappresenta i quattro generi 
principali di tempo che contribuiscono alla ripartizione delle roccie 
nel ciclo della roccia.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση αντιπροσωπεύει τα τέσσερα σημαντικά
είδη καιρού που συμβάλλουν στη διακοπή των βράχων στον κύκλο 
βράχου.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración representa las cuatro clases 
principales de tiempo que contribuyen a la ruptura de rocas en el 
ciclo de la roca.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Frost</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Regen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Felsenschleife</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sonne</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wetter</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wind</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">geada</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">chuva</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">ciclo da rocha</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">sol</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">tempo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
